objects.specification: A flat rectangular floor plane covered with an earth-tone themed low-pile carpet featuring a subtle sediment-inspired pattern, matte finish with slight texture variation for a natural prehistoric ambiance.

A realistic dinosaur skeleton model composed of bone-colored resin replicas of each fossil bone, connected with discreet metal supports, mounted on a low-profile display platform, with fine anatomical detail and a slightly weathered surface texture.

A tall wooden bookshelf with a rich dark wood finish, recessed shelves filled with assorted dinosaur-themed books of varying thickness and height, visible colorful spines, realistic wood grain texture, and slight signs of wear.
